definitions.title: m.
definitions.body: ] fat, fertile, place;—pl. cstr. [[מִשְׁמַנֵּי הָאָרֶץ]] (Ges:§§ 20a 93 ee) Ge 27:23 (poem in J; [[מִן]] partit), v:Ge 27:39 (poem in E; [[מִן]] priv. acc. to Thes Ew Di Gunk al.; < partit. here as v:b, Vulgate [LXX a)po/ in both], AV RV Nö:Ency. Bib 1184, cf. Dr).
